load("@io_bazel_rules_go//go:def.bzl", "go_library", "go_test")

go_library(
    name = "zip",
    srcs = glob(
        include = ["*.go"],
        exclude = ["*_test.go"],
    ),
    importpath = "golang.org/x/mod/zip",
    tags = [
        "manual",  # Only build when needed as a dependency.
    ],
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [
        "//vendor/go/golang.org/x/mod/module",
        "//vendor/go/rsc.io/quote",
    ],
)

go_test(
    name = "zip_test",
    size = "small",
    srcs = glob(["*_test.go"]),
    data = glob(["testdata/**"]) + [
        "@rust_linux_x86_64//:rustc",
    ],
    embed = [":zip"],
    deps = [
        "//vendor/go/rsc.io/diff",
    ],
)
